main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object in the sky while walking home from college in Garden City, New York.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 5:40 to 5:50 P.M. EST on November 12, 1959., The object exhibited erratic motion and climbed steadily while oscillating in brightness., The object was reported to be yellowish white or white with occasional green light blinks., The observer noted that the object made no noise and left no trail or exhaust., The Air Force concluded that the sighting might have been the moon viewed through haze.
witness description: A student from Adelphia College walking home.
